iconClassName.description: An optional icon className to use for the remove icon when `removable`.

rotateIcon.description:
Boolean if the `.md-chip-icon--rotate` style should be applied to the remove icon.
The `.md-chip-icon--rotate` just rotates the icon 45 degrees.

children.description: Any children used to display the remove icon when `removable`.

label.description: The label to display on the chip.

removable.description: Boolean if the chip is removable.

avatar.description: An optional avatar to display on the chip.

onClick.description: An optional function to call when the `click` event is triggered.

onMouseOver.description: An optional function to call when the `mouseover` event is triggered.

onMouseLeave.description: An optional function to call when the `mouseleave` event is triggered.
